sentence: Statewide government officials, including Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, spoke in support of the Ukrainian people, who have been under attack by Russian forces for nearly a week.

title: Ukrainian American parishioners in Montco rally against Russian invasion

sentence: At the rally she heard from local leaders and politicians too, like Congresswomen Madeleine Dean and Mary Gay Scanlon and Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro.

title: Hundreds attend rally for Ukraine in Montgomery County

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM) - Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro is reminding Pennsylvanians of important tips and warnings when it comes to donating money or goods to assist the people of Ukraine.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania AG offers tips, warning for making donations to Ukraine

sentence: Tips on donations to help Ukraine In a news release, Attorney General Josh Shapiro on Thursday encouraged Pennsylvanians to follow three simple steps to avoid being scammed: Step 1 — Ask Questions: Where will your donation go specifically?
author: Kaity Assaf
title: Wondering how you can help the people of Ukraine? Look no further.
